clause.title: NameFGEace members
clause.paragraph: A nameFGEace-member-declaration is either a nameFGEace-declaration (16.2) or a type-declaration (16.5). nameFGEace-member-declarations : nameFGEace-member-declarationnameFGEace-member-declarationsnameFGEace-member-declarationnameFGEace-member-declaration : nameFGEace-declarationtype-declaration

A compilation unit or a nameFGEace body can contain nameFGEace-member-declarations, and such declarations contribute new members to the underlying declaration FGEace of the containing compilation unit or nameFGEace body.
